## 7\

## 8
```{r}
which(rownames(mtcars)=="Datsun 710")#Datsun 710's row number 
which(colnames(mtcars)=="cyl") #Number of cylinders's column number
mtcars[which(rownames(mtcars)=="Datsun 710"),which(colnames(mtcars)=="cyl")]
```
